nodes.text: The Lucent Ivaya was a quadrant of space located in the Bright Jewel system. It contained the Tansarii Point Station, the Station Gamma, the Masul'ivis Asteroid Belt, the H-5 70 Mining Facility and the Lurid Aurora Nebula.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Lucent Ivaya was considered as the safest quadrant of the Bright Jewel system. It was frequented by civilian ships heading to and from Ord Mantell as well as Dynathian mining transports, and patrolled by Car'das starfighters. During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station, Black Sun pirates raided the quadrant and targeted Dynathian and Car'das forces. Laetin A'shera dispatched pilots who successfully repelled the Black Sun starfighters.
